overview:
As Senior Project Manager, Brian manages union, corporate, and trade association clients for NMS while focusing on progressive issues.

A member of the NMS team since 2006 â€“ he has also worked on online intelligence/outreach and social networking at NMS for political candidates, issue advocacy campaigns, non-profits, corporate, and automotive clients.

Prior to NMS, Brian worked as an Associate Project Director for pollster and media consultant Frank Luntz. Before focusing on communications, Brian worked with the Emmy Award-winning Discovery Education team at Discovery Communications.

Brian is a proud alumni of VirginiaTechâ€™s Corps of Cadets and received an Honorable Discharge from the USAF. Outside the office, Brian serves as the New Media Director for the Arlington County Democratic Committee and is active in the music blogosphere.
